title: Head First EJB [pdf, english, separate chapters, +code].rar
description:
With Head First EJB, you&#039;ll learn not just what the technology *is*, but more importantly, *why* it is, and what it is and isn&#039;t good for. You&#039;ll learn tricks and tips for EJB development, along with tricks and tips for passing this latest, very challenging Sun Certified Business Component Developer (SCBCD) exam. You&#039;ll learn how to think like a server. You&#039;ll learn how to think like a bean. And because this is a Head First book, you&#039;ll learn how to think about thinking... And nobody knows the certification like they doÃƒÂ¢??they&#039;re co-developers of Sun&#039;s actual exam! In Head First EJB, you&#039;ll learn all about:

    * Component-based and role-based development
    * The architecture of EJB, distributed programming with RMI
    * Developing and Deploying an EJB application
    * The Client View of a Session and Entity bean
    * The Session Bean Lifecycle and Component Contract
    * The Entity bean Lifecycle and Component Contract
    * Container-managed Persistence (CMP)
    * Container-managed Relationships (CMR)
    * EJB-QL
    * Transactions
    * Security
    * EJB Exceptions
    * The Deployment Descriptor
    * The Enterprise Bean Environment in JNDI
    * Programming Restrictions and Portability
